rules_text:
{T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.
You may spend mana as though it was any color to activate abilities of permanents you control.
{6}: Discover 3. Activate this ability only if you control a God. [i](To discover 3, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 3 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]
